chinese: 不少人发现了这个赚钱的好机会，也开了奶茶店。
english: Many people discovered this money-making opportunity and also opened milk tea shops.
possible_solutions: 不少人发现了这个赚钱的好机会，也开了奶茶店。

chinese: 有些奶茶店选择的地点不好，也没有人去买。
english: Some milk tea shops chose bad locations, and also no one went to buy from them.
chinese_word_bank: 有些奶茶店选择的地点
possible_solutions: 有些奶茶店选择的地点不好，也没有人去买。

chinese: 人们知道咖啡里有咖啡因，也习惯了咖啡是“瘾”料。
english: People know that coffee contains caffeine and are also used to coffee being an addictive drink.
possible_solutions: 人们知道咖啡里有咖啡因，也习惯了咖啡是“瘾”料。

chinese: 人们爱上奶茶，可能不是因为好喝，也不是因为便宜。
english: People fell in love with milk tea, possibly not because it tastes good, and also not because it is cheap.
possible_solutions: 人们爱上奶茶，可能不是因为好喝，也不是因为便宜。

chinese: 有些奶茶店赚不到钱，也有些奶茶店生意很好。
english: Some milk tea shops do not make money, and also some milk tea shops have very good business.
possible_solutions: 有些奶茶店赚不到钱，也有些奶茶店生意很好。
有些奶茶店赚不到钱，有些奶茶店生意也很好。
